model.name: DataServiceLayer
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW room( id integer NOT NULL, description string(256) NOT NULL, room_type string(256) NOT NULL, room_number integer NOT NULL, max_capacity integer NOT NULL, hotel_id integer NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT room_pk PRIMARY KEY(id) ) AS SELECT 1 as id, 'description' as description, 'King' as room_type, 666 as room_number, 2 as max_capacity, 32983 as hotel_id;
